thumb.title: 「いや、いやだ。」（『テレマーケターを脅す』より）"No, no." (From Jim Florentine's "Terrorizing Telemarketers")
thumb.description: Jim Florentine's series "Terrorizing Telemarketers"In this series, Jim is scathing in his criticism of telemarketers.They are easily described by Americans as "obnoxious, money-hungry nuisances."Telemarketers have to call strangers they don't want to get involved with at all,There is a bad habit of abusing people.Jim Florentine is a comedian who works on the radio.We hope you enjoy it.Presenting: "Terrorizing Telemarketers",A series by Jim Florentine.In this series, Jim abuses telemarketers, who can easily bedescribed by Americans as "obnoxious and money-hungry pests".Telemarketers have a bad habit of abusing people by callingstrangers that want nothing to do with them.Jim Florentine is a comedian with a history in radio.Enjoy.Note: This video entirely relied onGoogle Translate. Sorry for any badtranslations!Note: This video isIt is completely dependent on Google Translate.Please forgive me if the translation is wrong.
